author: Steven Carroll

review: The Fire Tv stick arrived quickly, was prertty simple to setup and had a lot of interesring apps. unfortunately the only movies that streamed wirhout any problems was from amazon. Netflix, hulu+ and even streamimg directly from my pc caused buffering problems. Luckily a had a roku setup om the same tv and when the tv stick would buffer or freeze, I could connect with my roku and continue watching my show or movie without this particular issue. The fire tv stick has a lot of potential but my primary reason purchasing this product is streaming movies and shows and it doesn't meet my expectations in that respect.
author: Amazon Customer "blue hen"
